fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This=

er said.

 Arrow stood up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender =
started to look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plent=

ur ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stran=
